label: Object Path
info:
To optimize on camera model and camera settings, import the following nodes 
and set set the camera credentials.


[
    {
        "id": "02db7f93b04a492f",
        "type": "change",
        "z": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "name": "",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "set",
                "p": "device",
                "pt": "global",
                "to": "payload",
                "tot": "msg"
            }
        ],
        "action": "",
        "property": "",
        "from": "",
        "to": "",
        "reg": false,
        "x": 690,
        "y": 100,
        "wires": [
            [
                "b5b64f4f7b769d83"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "fa380eb259be45b7",
        "type": "inject",
        "z": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "name": "",
        "props": [
            {
                "p": "payload"
            },
            {
                "p": "topic",
                "vt": "str"
            }
        ],
        "repeat": "",
        "crontab": "",
        "once": true,
        "onceDelay": 0.1,
        "topic": "",
        "payload": "",
        "payloadType": "date",
        "x": 250,
        "y": 100,
        "wires": [
            [
                "c8ef8d97328edd23",
                "c73446698e69b019"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "b5b64f4f7b769d83",
        "type": "debug",
        "z": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "name": "debug 187",
        "active": false,
        "tosidebar": true,
        "console": false,
        "tostatus": false,
        "complete": "false",
        "statusVal": "",
        "statusType": "auto",
        "x": 930,
        "y": 100,
        "wires": []
    },
    {
        "id": "c8ef8d97328edd23",
        "type": "Axis device",
        "z": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "name": "",
        "preset": "a5d60ef5587cc8fc",
        "action": "Device Info",
        "cgi": "",
        "data": "",
        "options": "",
        "filename": "",
        "x": 470,
        "y": 100,
        "wires": [
            [
                "02db7f93b04a492f"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "c73446698e69b019",
        "type": "Axis camera",
        "z": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "name": "",
        "preset": "a5d60ef5587cc8fc",
        "action": "Camera Info",
        "resolution": "640x360",
        "output": "Base64",
        "filename": "",
        "options": "",
        "data": "",
        "x": 470,
        "y": 160,
        "wires": [
            [
                "83dd6a8c155a030a"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "1d5013c65acf6edc",
        "type": "debug",
        "z": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "name": "debug 193",
        "active": false,
        "tosidebar": true,
        "console": false,
        "tostatus": false,
        "complete": "false",
        "statusVal": "",
        "statusType": "auto",
        "x": 930,
        "y": 160,
        "wires": []
    },
    {
        "id": "83dd6a8c155a030a",
        "type": "change",
        "z": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "name": "",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "set",
                "p": "camera",
                "pt": "global",
                "to": "payload",
                "tot": "msg"
            }

        "action": "",

    },
    {
        "id": "a5d60ef5587cc8fc",
        "type": "Device Access",
        "name": "Localhost",
        "address": "localhost",
        "protocol": "http"
    }
]
